screenshot.caption: LDOC file open in FRANZIS CutOut 10

description: CutOut is a Windows app that provides various tools for removing images' backgrounds and composing photo collages. In addition, the software allows you to save projects, close them, then re-open them for further editing.
To create an LDOC file with CutOut:
After you finish editing your project, you can save it in a widely supported image format, such as .JPEG or .TIFF .
